properties.title: Prologue - starting point
properties.description: 1. Foot of the Pulaski Bridge. This is where the walk will begin.

properties.title: Prologue - walking path
properties.description: 2. Walk along this path while listening to the prologue.

properties.title: Prologue/Chapter 1
properties.description: End Prologue here, stopping on the bridge, at the creek lookout nearest Greenpoint. Listen to Chapter 1 while standing on the bridge at the lookout over the creek.

properties.title: Chapter 2 - walking path
properties.description: 1. Listen while continuing to walk down the bridge.

properties.title: Chapter 2 - staircase
properties.description: 2. Stop at the staircase on the right. End Chapter 2 here.

properties.title: Chapter 3 - walking path 1
properties.description: 1. Begin Chapter 3 at the bottom of the stairs. Listen while walking on Ash Street.

properties.title: Chapter 3 - walking path 2
properties.description: 3. Turn right when Pauline does and walk to the creek.

properties.title: Chapter 3/Chapter 4
properties.description: End Chapter 3 here. Listen to Chapter 4 while standing in the park at the edge of the creek.

properties.title: Chapter 5 - walking path
properties.description: Listen while walking away from the creek, turn right on Commercial Street. Stop at the iron gate peering into the alleyway/courtyard (between Glasserie and Brooklyn Ice Cream Factory).

properties.title: Chapter 6
properties.description: Listen to Chapter 6 while standing at the iron gate peering into the alleyway/courtyard next to the right of Glasserie.

properties.title: Chapter 7
properties.description: Listen while continuing down Commercial St., then turn right and walk between the high rises to the waterfront.

properties.title: Chapter 8
properties.description: Listen while walking toward the waterfront and turning left.

properties.title: Chapter 9
properties.description: Listen while walking through or sitting in the park (Newtown Barge Playground).

properties.title: Chapter 10
properties.description: 1. Listen while walking from the park on West Street.

properties.title: Chapter 11
properties.description: Listen while walking on Huron Street toward the river.
